title: The Mermaid/Siren Audio Pack
description: A Sample pack where developers can craft their own sounds for a Mermaid or Siren like creature
longDescription:
A Sample pack where developers can craft their own sounds for a Mermaid or Siren like creature.


Audio Demo


Mermaid_Laugh1

Mermaid_Laugh2

Included is listed below in Verb format and Foley SFX Format

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Vox Dry
  • Vox with Verb
  • Vox with Verb and Water
  • Water Foley
  • Splashes and Crashes
  • Ship Ambiences
  • Weather


Number of Audio Waves: 274

Number of Audio Cues: 274

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz 24Bit)

Do Sound FX loop: (Some of them do)

Minutes of audio provided: 38:32 Minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes:
